title: For sale 待售
introduction: Listen to the tape then answer this question. What does the woman want?
听录音，然后回答问题。这位女士想要什么？

text_and_translation.text: CAROL: Look, Sally. Those shoes are very nice.
text_and_translation.translation: 卡罗尔：看，萨莉。那些鞋子很漂亮。

text_and_translation.text: CAROL: I know! But they're very nice, so maybe it's OK.
text_and_translation.translation: 卡罗尔：我知道！但它们很漂亮，所以也许没关系。

notes.title: For sale
notes.describe: 表示物品正在出售，可用在私人出售或商店销售的场合。

notes.title: How much are they?
notes.describe: 询问价格的常用语，用于询问物品的成本或售价。

notes.title: They're very expensive...
notes.describe: 表示物品的价格很高，可能超出了购买者的预算或期望。
